education school linkedin description (1:
McGill University is one of Canada's best-known institutions of higher learning and one of the leading universities in the world. With students coming to McGill from some 150 countries, our student body is the most internationally diverse of any research-intensive university in the country.  McGill was founded in 1821 thanks to a generous bequest by James McGill, and since then, we've grown from a small college to a bustling university with three campuses, 11 faculties, some 300 programs of study, and more than 37,500 students. The University also partners with four affiliated teaching hospitals to graduate over 1,000 health care professionals each year.

The goal of McGill University's social media platforms is to strengthen our community, which includes students, faculty, and alumni. The aim is to provide information on events, campus news and promote networking.

McGill University fosters freedom of expression, while valuing respect and collegiality. We encourage respectful dialogue and reserve the right to remove the following: Comments deemed offensive, vulgar or profane; comments off-topic and/or unrelated to posted content; content that infringes on an individual's privacy or copyright.
education school linkedin description (2:
The University of London is the UK’s largest provider of international online and distance education, which it delivers in partnership with 17 federation member universities, to improve access to higher education around the world.

The University’s purpose is to increase access to education, champion research excellence and deliver social good.

More than 40,000 students in over 190 countries around the world are studying University of London programmes.

The federation of the University of London is made up of 17 renowned higher education institutions. Collectively this federation contributes to making London the global capital for Higher Education; London is home to more top-ranking universities than any other city worldwide.

The University of London is also a national leader in the humanities, promoting and facilitating research across disciplines and advocating for the humanities and their importance to society.

While rooted in London, the University was founded on the ideals of inclusivity, diversity and collaboration and its global community is united by a common belief: that the power of collective expertise can transform people’s lives.

job description:
Community-led, diverse in behaviour, for the digital tech brave. We are Trust in SODA, the digital tech recruitment specialists. We empower and build diverse communities that represent the digital tech world we live in. We are proud to be officially B Corp certified, joining a global network of organisations dedicated to using their platform as a force for positive change.  Our consultants focus on delivering talent solutions across Software Engineering, DevOps, Data, Design, Marketing & Sales and Product Management.  

Our SODA Squad operate in the UK, Ireland (Dublin), Switzerland (Zug), and the USA (Boston) to deliver a tailor-made service to employers and candidates via our embedded, outsourced and retained hiring solutions. 

We have our own communities - SODA Social and Women in DevOps, where we host regular events, podcasts, and webinars, and publish blogs, articles and white papers, in collaboration with industry leaders and academic partners (code institute), community partners, (Coding Black Females), and charity partners (Smart Works). 

We are part of Trinnovo Group – We build long-term partnerships with our clients, candidates, and communities around a shared group mission to build diversity, create inclusion, and encourage workplace innovation.  

We are a multi-award-winning organisation, and our recent awards & accreditations include: 
• B Corp Certified 
• Investors in People Platinum  
• TIARA's 'Best Company to Work for (£20-£50m)' Award, 2022 & 2021 & 2020 
• TIARA’s ‘Diversity, Equity & Inclusion’ Award 2022 
• SIA 'Best Staffing Firm to Work for' in the UK' 2022 
• SIA 'Best Staffing Firms to Work for across the US' 2022 
• Best Companies' 3-Star Accreditation 2022 & 2021 
• Tiara's 'Growth Award' 2021 & 2020 
• Tiara's 'Recruitment Leader of the Year' 2021 
• APSCo Awards for Excellence 'Diversity & Inclusion Award' 2019 (SODA) 

Trust our people. Trust our network. Trust In SODA. Get in touch with us or find out more at www.trustinsoda.com

job description (3):
I was brought on by TheoremOne (a previous client of mine) to help streamline their recruitment processes and create a more results oriented culture within their Talent Acquisition function. I also specialised in strategic personnel acquisitions and created teams across new disciplines in TH1’s technical matrix. 

Key Achievements:
● Took over the lowest performing Talent Acquisition sub-team (six personnel) and turned it into the highest performing unit within the function.
● Streamlined the team's workflow processes, decreasing time-to-fill by 30% - from six to four weeks.
● Overhauled the stakeholder-management processes by assigning a dedicated recruiter to each stakeholder and implementing a vertical-based approach. This created greater trust and accountability and allowed team members to become specialists within a specific market.
● Reduced CV-to-Offer from 20:1 to 7:1 within the Product, Programme and Design pipelines.
● Organised recruitment skills workshops with stakeholders from the Software, Product and Programme functions to create a continuous improvement loop and drive excellence within talent search.
● Worked directly with TH1’s Co-Founder to define Gen-AI requirements and recruitment mission.

summary:
Professional Summary:
Accomplished pharmaceutical professional with 22+ years of experience in R&D, Formulation Development, Process Optimization, and Technical Transfer within the solid oral dosage (SOD) pharmaceutical industry. Expertise spans ANDA/NDA development, IND submissions (505(b)(2)), lifecycle management, and regulatory compliance (FDA, GMP).
Core Competencies:
•	Formulation technologies: multi particulates, direct compression, encapsulation, wet granulation, roller compaction, fluid bed granulation, Wurster coating
•	Clinical and commercial batch manufacturing, scale-up, and validation
•	Regulatory strategy (CBE-0/30, PAS, SUPAC) and FDA GMP audit readiness
•	Team leadership, training, cross-functional project coordination
•	QbD, DOE, CAPA, and risk assessments
•	Hands-on in controlled substances (Schedules I–V) and tech transfer across global facilities

Career Highlights:
•	Director – Contract Pharmacal Corp (2021–Present): Led multiple product development and transfer projects; addressed FDA deficiencies; collaborated across R&D, regulatory, QA, and supply chain.

•	Sr. Manager – Tedor Pharma & InvaGen Pharma (2017–2021): Managed formulation R&D for US and EU markets, focusing on IND/ANDA/NDA development; supported FDA submissions and audits.

•	Senior Scientist/Manager – InvaGen Pharma (2009–2017): Guided formulation and validation of solid dosage forms, mentored scientists, and served as SME during site transfers and audits.

•	Formulation Roles – Sun Pharma, Accumed, Cipla, Natco (1999–2009): Built foundational expertise in formulation design, scale-up, and stability studies for US and ROW markets.

Education:
•	M.S. in Pharmacy (Pharmaceutics) – M.G.R. Health University, India
•	B.S. in Pharmacy – Gulbarga University, India
•	Project Management Certification – Rutgers University, NJ

Regulatory Experience:
Multiple successful FDA inspections and product approvals; comprehensive experience with ANDA, IND 505(b)(2), lifecycle management, and global tech transfer.
linkedin description:
Join Contract Pharmacal Corp. (CPC) on a journey to a healthier world where innovation meets excellence in developing, manufacturing, packaging and testing cutting edge vitamins, minerals & supplements (VMS) and over-the-counter drugs (OTC).

Known for quality and one of the oldest, largest leaders in the nutraceutical and pharmaceutical industries, the company is employee-owned with more than 1,250 highly skilled professionals in its Hauppauge NY facilities totaling almost one-million square-feet. CPC has averaged development of approximately 100 new products per year since 1971, and has capacity to support manufacturing more than 25-billion doses annually. 

CPC's customers rank among the world's top pharmaceutical companies, marketing companies (CPG), retailers, and wholesalers; and more than 60 partners around the globe trust CPC as their CDMO (contract development & manufacturing organization) - from the early stages of product innovation and development - to commercial manufacturing, packaging, and analytical testing. 

Get in touch with our business development team at info@cpc.com and we’ll help you create a competitive edge, navigate regulations, and bring your products to market faster than ever!

"건강한 삶의 방식들로 가득찬 세상을 만들자."

프레시코드는 국내 최초로 신선식품 스팟 배송 시스템을 구현하여 운영하고 있는 푸드테크 스타트업 입니다. 2016년 시작하여 현재 한국에서 가장 대표적인 프리미엄 샐러드 브랜드로 자리 매김 하였으며, 약 1300개의 공유 배송지 프코스팟을 운영하고 있습니다.

프레시코드는 고객이 행복함과 건강한 만족감을 느낄 수 있는 한 끼 식사 샐러드와 같은 건강 간편식 브랜드와 상품을 개발하고, 고객들이 함께 이용할 수 있는 비대면 공유 배송지 프코스팟을 도심 어디에나 만들어 수 있는 플랫폼 제공을 통해 건강한 삶의 방식을 주변 사람들과 자연스럽게 나눌 수 있는 서비스를 만들고 있습니다.

프레시코드의 시작은 "어떻게 하면 한끼 식사 샐러드를 합리적으로 지속가능하게 이용할 수 있을까?"였으나, 지금의 프레시코드는 샐러드를 넘어 "건강한 삶의 방식을 어떻게하면 더 쉽게 더 재밌게 공유하고 나눌 수 있을까?" 에 대해 고민하고 있습니다. 

프레시코드가 정의하는 "건강한 삶의 방식"은 단순히 건강한 음식을 넘어 건강한 커뮤니티, 건강한 가치관, 건강한 지구까지 그 영역과 임팩트를 점점 더 확장해 나가야한다는 사명감을 가지고 일하고 있습니다.

2021년은 샐러드 외에 더욱 다양한 제품을 선보이고, 3천개 이상의 프코스팟을 운영하는 건강 간편식 스팟 배송 플랫폼으로써 성장을 목표로 하고 있어 프레시코드에게 매우 중요한 한해가 될 것입니다. 이 도약의 시기에 함께할 열정 넘치고 뛰어난 동료를 기다리고 있습니다.

At Curology, we understand that accessibility to clear skin can transform lives. That’s why we provide personalized prescription medications, custom-formulated to address each patient's unique skin concerns, conveniently delivered right to their doorstep. Our expertise in acne and anti-aging solutions enables us to offer highly effective and affordable care tailored to our patients' specific needs.

We are driven by a mission to inspire confidence that goes deeper than skin. Our dedicated team of dermatology providers is committed to making professional acne care accessible to millions of individuals. We facilitate 1:1 interactions with real dermatology providers, fostering a supportive environment where patients can evolve alongside their skincare journeys.

In addition to our prescription services, we offer an extensive portfolio of dermatologist-designed, developed, and tested cosmetic and over-the-counter (OTC) products. This comprehensive range ensures our patients have access to holistic skincare solutions that cater to their individual requirements. 

Together, we celebrate milestones and uplift one another on our skincare journeys. Join us in our mission to transform skin health and enhance lives, one patient at a time.

summary:
'I shall pass this way but once; any good, therefore, that I can do or any kindness that I can show to any human being, let me do it now. Let me not defer nor neglect it, for I shall not pass this way again.'

I'm passionate about assisting to empower people to overcome their circumstances, regardless as to what they may be. I aspire to be the coach, leader, parent and person that I never had the opportunity to meet when I was younger.

My core values were shaped by the teachings of Simon Sinek, Jim Roth and Tony Robbins and motivated by William Hollis and Les Brown. Having had the opportunity to learn directly from Heather Monahan and her esteemed Elite cohort, I am a committed lifelong learner and embrace the obstacles life places in front of me.

As CXO of Brite-Liter, we have gained recognition from LuxLife magazine and Nasdaq's Faces of Entrepreneurship series. Our globally recognized tool and technique has served hundreds of children in learning foundational skills of literacy, specifically phonics. Out tool increases engagement by 10x and has measured over 400% increases in retention in less than 4 hours! We do this with printed material as opposed to screens. If you would like to learn more or have any questions, please do not hesitate to reach out.

I am also grateful for the opportunity to be instrumental in bringing new concepts and perspective to our local varsity high school football team and helped them achieve their first winning season since 2015. Although my presence was felt, all credit goes to the kids and the rest of the coaching staff in rising to be better versions of themselves.

The electrical industry is one I have extensive knowledge in - as a contractor, inspector, instructor and in distribution sales - having consulted, designed or served in another capacity on multiple $1M+ projects - feel free to reach out, happy to help, especially if you need an assist in troubleshooting.

Balancing professional accomplishments, I am also the proud father of two boys.

I also subscribe to the HAPPEN principle - 

Helping
All
People
Prioritize
Expanding
Networks
...you never know where a connection may lead. 

If I, or another within my network, can be of service to you on your journey, I'm only a click and less than 300 characters away...

education school linkedin description (1:
McGill University is one of Canada's best-known institutions of higher learning and one of the leading universities in the world. With students coming to McGill from some 150 countries, our student body is the most internationally diverse of any research-intensive university in the country.  McGill was founded in 1821 thanks to a generous bequest by James McGill, and since then, we've grown from a small college to a bustling university with three campuses, 11 faculties, some 300 programs of study, and more than 37,500 students. The University also partners with four affiliated teaching hospitals to graduate over 1,000 health care professionals each year.

The goal of McGill University's social media platforms is to strengthen our community, which includes students, faculty, and alumni. The aim is to provide information on events, campus news and promote networking.

McGill University fosters freedom of expression, while valuing respect and collegiality. We encourage respectful dialogue and reserve the right to remove the following: Comments deemed offensive, vulgar or profane; comments off-topic and/or unrelated to posted content; content that infringes on an individual's privacy or copyright.
education school linkedin description (2:
Drew University, a Phi Beta Kappa liberal arts university, includes the College of Liberal Arts, the Drew Theological School and the Caspersen School of Graduate Studies. Drew is located on a beautiful, wooded, 186-acre campus in Madison, New Jersey, a thriving small town close to New York City.

It has a total enrollment of more than 2,000 students and has 145 full-time faculty members, 94% of whom hold the terminal degree in their field. The Theological and Caspersen schools offer MA and PhD degrees and the College confers BA degrees in more than 30 disciplines.

Drew is dedicated to exceptional faculty mentorship, a commitment to connecting the campus with the community and a focus on experiential learning. Particularly noteworthy opportunities for undergraduates include the the Charles A. Dana Research Institute for Scientists Emeriti (RISE), home of 2015 Nobel Prize Winner for Medicine and Drew Fellow William Campbell, the Drew Summer Science Institute (DSSI), the Center for Civic Engagement, as well as New York City semesters focusing on Wall Street, the United Nations, Contemporary Art, Theatre, Social Entrepreneurship and Communications and Media in New York City and several international semester programs.

Drew also houses the Center on Religion, Culture & Conflict, the Center for Holocaust/Genocide Study and the Shakespeare Theatre of New Jersey, an independent professional theater, as well as the United Methodist Archives and History Center and one of the country’s leading concentrations of materials on Willa Cather.

Within its portfolio of premium beauty brands that champion organic and natural ingredients are: Maison L'Occitane en Provence, Melvita, Erborian, L’OCCITANE au Brésil, LimeLife by Alcone, ELEMIS, Sol de Janeiro and Dr. Vranjes Firenze. 
Innovative venture studio OBRATORI is also part of the Group. 

With its nature-positive vision and entrepreneurial ethos, L’OCCITANE Group is committed to investing in communities, biodiversity, reducing waste and to finding sustainable solutions to create a better and healthier planet.
The mission statement of the Group is: With empowerment we positively impact people and regenerate nature. 
The L'OCCITANE Group is a certified B Corporation.

summary:
Experienced Data Scientist | Machine Learning Engineer | AI Innovator

With 11 years of hands-on experience in Data Science and Machine Learning, I specialize in managing the full ML lifecycle—from ideation to deployment. My expertise includes designing high-accuracy predictive models, scalable production systems, ranking frameworks, and architecting robust ML Ops pipelines.

I’ve developed advanced applications across Generative AI, including Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipelines for real-world solutions like automated appeals letter generation, leveraging tools such as GCP, BigQuery, and Google Agent Builder. My technical skill set spans Computer Vision (Vision Transformers), multi-modal systems (integrating audio, spatial, and geo-data), Recommender Systems, Anomaly Detection, and Deep Neural Networks for predictive learning.

Highly proficient in NLP, I’ve led projects in Sentiment Analysis and implemented Large Language Models (LLMs) using LangChain. A natural data storyteller, I thrive at translating complex datasets into actionable insights through compelling visualizations that empower smarter decision-making.

Beyond technical expertise, I’ve demonstrated leadership by mentoring junior data scientists and guiding cross-functional teams to success. I’m passionate about driving innovation and actively seeking a challenging role within a dynamic organization to create impactful, scalable solutions.

Let’s connect to explore how I can help drive your AI initiatives forward!

Languages: Python, SQL, R
Tools & Frameworks: Pandas, R Studio, GCP, Vertex AI, Agent Builder, Google APIS, BigQuery, Looker Studio, Excel, Azure Data Factory, Databricks, NumPy, SciKit Learn, AWS, SageMaker, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras, MATLAB, PySpark, Hadoop, Gitbash, Spacy, Kubernetes, Docker, ML Flow, Alteryx
Databases: Azure Data Factory, Databricks, MongoDB
Other Technical Skills: Machine Learning Lifecycle, Neural Networks, Natural Language Processing (NLP), Computer Vision, API Scripting, Data Pipelines, Model Deployment, Model Testing, Data Structures, Data Visualization, Predictive Modeling, Statistical Modeling, Regression, Clustering & Classification, Web Scraping, AWS, Sentiment Analysis, Data Lake, A/B Testing, Deep Learning, Reinforcement Learning, LSTM, Vectors, Transformers

Github: https://github.com/sjdesai1
Feel free to contact me at: sjdesai87@gmail.com
job description:
•	Oversaw the full machine learning lifecycle from ideation to deployment, including stakeholder meetings, API scripting, data transformation, model development, and performance monitoring to prevent data drift.
•	Developed anomaly detection models using ANN and gradient-boosted forests for a network of 150,000 devices, implementing a system to predict and minimize hardware and software outages, reducing downtime significantly.
•	Developed Bi-Directional RNN for sentiment analysis on healthcare reviews, including named entity recognition and TF-IDF. Orchestrated a large corpus built on multiple languages, including Spanish and Chinese, integrated SME insights for medical terminology, and deployed a real-time scoring web app via Docker, enhancing review insights on tablets used within the healthcare setting.
•	Led the creation of vision transformer models for detecting inflammation in colon imagery, collaborating with colorectal cancer experts to support clinical decision-making through advanced image segmentation and detection techniques.
•	Contributed to the development of 'ProvConnect', an AI chatbot for HR inquiries, focusing on model refinement, ML observability to ensure sustained performance, and using retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) for the retrieval of different data sources and online search.
•	Built and managed a centralized feature store for efficient data feature preprocessing and scaling, enabling faster and more effective ML model development across projects.
•	Provided leadership and mentorship to a team of three, enhancing their skills in ML techniques through detailed reviews and regular educational sessions, promoting a culture of continuous learning and quality improvement.
location: New York, New York, United States
linkedin description:
Every day, 119,000 compassionate caregivers serve patients and communities through Providence St. Joseph Health, a national, Catholic, not-for-profit health system, driven by a belief that health is a human right. 

Rooted in the founding missions of the Sisters of Providence and the Sisters of St. Joseph of Orange, courageous women ahead of their time who brought health care and other social services to the American West when it was still a rugged, untamed frontier, we share a singular commitment to improve the health of all.

From our earliest days, we’ve met new challenges by pioneering new solutions. Today, with 51 hospitals, 829 clinics and a comprehensive range of services, we strive to meet the needs of communities across Alaska, California, Montana, New Mexico, Oregon, Texas and Washington through a diverse family of Catholic, other faith-based and mission-driven secular organizations. 

Now, as we face a new frontier—a changing health care landscape—we draw upon their pioneering and compassionate spirit to plan for the next century of health for a better world, especially for the poor and vulnerable.

If you need treatment, please visit www.providence.org to locate a health care provider.
linkedin specialities: healthcare, hospital, mission and charity, not-for-profit, community hospital, insurance, community benefit
job description (2):
•	Predictive Modeling for Healthcare: Developed regression models to predict the duration of patient medication usage based on historical healthcare and census data. These models effectively forecast future consumer needs for specific medications, aiding in long-term strategic planning for specialty pharmacy services.
•	Consumer Base Forecasting: Utilized census data in conjunction with personal healthcare records to predict potential future medication needs, consumer base expansions, and referral opportunities for physicians, enhancing the targeting and effectiveness of marketing strategies.
•	Customer Segmentation: Leveraged census data for customer segmentation to identify and prospect new clients, enhancing marketing efforts and expanding the consumer base.
•	Fraud Detection: Engaged in fraud detection activities for Medicare and Medicaid payments, ensuring compliance and identifying fraudulent activities.
•	Database Management: Engineered and maintained a robust SQL Studio database by integrating multiple data sources, housing over 15 million data entries. This central database significantly improved the accessibility and reliability of historical data analysis.
•	Automation and Data Processing: Developed and implemented stored procedures using SQL, along with Macros and VBA code in Excel, to automate the processes of data cleansing, transformation, and presentation. These automations facilitated efficient and dynamic data visualizations through live connections to Power BI.
•	Advanced Data Visualizations: Created over 100 Power BI visualizations and 20 comprehensive dashboards displaying critical metrics such as sales by region, drug types, income forecasts, inventory levels, patient adherence, and physician referrals. This initiative provided pivotal insights that drove data-driven decision-making across the organization.
linkedin description (2):
River's Edge Specialty Pharmacy is a leading full-service pharmacy providing specialty medications and infusion therapy services. 

Since 2008, River's Edge Specialty Pharmacy has become a leader in infusion services. Administered by specially trained infusion nurses, these services are provided at standalone locations, physicians’ offices, or in the comfort and privacy of the patient's home. Each location offers individualized care in a private setting for procedures including IVIG, Hemophilia, Chemotherapy, TPN, and Pain Management.

The pharmacists and technicians at River's Edge Specialty Pharmacy combine their professional expertise with caring support while helping patients navigate the complicated worlds of medicine and health insurance.

RE Specialty Pharmacy Services: 
– IV infusion
– Specialty pharmacy
– Sterile compounding 
– Medical equipment
– Oncology care
– HIV care
– Wound care 

RE Specialty Pharmacy specializes in comprehensive care management for patients who have complex or chronic conditions. In the home of the patient or in any preferred setting, RE Specialty Pharmacy professionals ensure therapy is comfortable and effective. By investing in new methods of proven technologies, RE Specialty Pharmacy is constantly evolving, ensuring the accuracy of diagnosis and treatment for patient care.

Specialty therapies include:
– Immunoglobulin therapy
– Blood disorders
– Acute and chronic infections
– Neurological diseases
– Bone and joint diseases
– Gastrointestinal disorders
– Liver diseases

education school linkedin description (3:
University of the Pacific, McGeorge School of Law is a private, ABA-accredited law school in the Oak Park neighborhood of the city of Sacramento, Calif. It is part of the University of the Pacific. Originally founded in 1924, the school merged with and became part of the University of the Pacific in 1966. The university also runs a Arthur A. Dugoni School of Dentistry in San Francisco, California. The dean of McGeorge School of Law is Michael Hunter Schwartz.

McGeorge offers programs leading to the award of the JD (Juris Doctor), the MSL (Master of Science in Law), the MPA (Master of Public Administration), the MPP (Master of Public Policy), the LLM (Master of Laws) and the JSD (Doctor of Juridical Science) degrees.

McGeorge offers both a three-year full-time program and four-year part-time program. As an ABA approved law school, McGeorge graduates are eligible to sit for the bar examination in any American jurisdiction.

linkedin description:
H&H Group is a global health and nutrition company. Dynamic, courageous and ambitious in its mission to make people healthier and happier, the Group strives to inspire wellness while contributing positively to the needs of society and the planet. The Group has three business segments – Baby, Adult and Pet Nutrition and Care – supporting whole-family health and happiness, with premium brands providing nutrition and wellness solutions backed by science. Consumer brands include Biostime, Swisse, Zesty Paws, Solid Gold Pet, Dodie, Good Goût and Aurelia London.  

Constantly innovating, the Group’s H&H Research centres are in China, Australia, Ireland, France and Switzerland. Its corporate innovation fund, NewH2, invests in the world’s emerging technologies in health, nutrition and wellness.  

As part of the world’s largest corporate social responsibility initiative, the UN Global Compact, the Group is committed to sustainability and enhancing the lives of people touched by the company. 

The Group is headquartered in Hong Kong SAR and listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange ("H&H INTL HLDG" stock code 1112), with a second head office in London. More than 3,300 team members are located across 16 countries: – Australia, New Zealand, Greater China, Singapore, India, Thailand, Malaysia, Indonesia, Switzerland, France, Italy, Ireland, the United Kingdom (UK), the United States (US) and Canada.

summary:
I have more than thirty seven years related design and business experience with commercial, military, medical and space grade RF and Microwave components and systems. I spent time Formatting a product line, with state of the art microwave hardware that increased sales and generated new customers. I also research and development new products using my professional skill set. 

Recently, I had the opportunity to learn the component engineering and reliability dimensions of manufacturing electronics. I have knowledge how to research military parts, generate up-screening documents and locate alternates. I also have learned Mentor Graphics for layout and schematic generation and Windchill PTC database management for generation of company specific parametric parts.

I have present experience with MIL-PRF-19500, group A and group B testing, generating up-screening drawings for COTS parts to space grade, parts stress analysis, worse case analysis, reliability calculations using RAM Commander software, reliability predictions, thermal junction temperature calculations and radiation analysis. I have also worked with component outgassing reports, shelf life items and conducted and radiation emissions control. Worked with FMECA report generation.

 I spent time reverse engineering military legacy hardware and improving the reliability of existing designs resulting in reduced errors and labor costs.

 I also can simulate, design and test passive and active RF and Microwave components and systems.
 I have extensive experience with documentation control of large and complicated projects. 



PROFESSIONAL SKILLS AND STRENGTHS:
Component Engineering
Locating and specifying Military grade components
Develop marketing and Business plans
Catalog development and customer relations
Failure mode analysis
Generate ACAD drawings
MS Excel formula and spreadsheet formulation

Generate flowcharts and plan projects

job title: SR RF ENGINEER; COMPONENT AND RELIABILITY SPECIALTIES
job description:
I am working remotely as a  full time Component engineer and Senior RF Engineer, for a various programs, including  a G band radiometer (front end) involving parts selection for class V space hardware, parts derating , radiation hardened active components and reviewing compliance requirements for EMI/EMC levels, both  conducted and radiated. I am learning reliability engineering concepts and now perform reliability calculations and reliability predictions as well as FMECA reports using RAM Commander software.

In addition, I am performing parts stress analysis, thermal calculations and generating up-screening documents for COTS parts to JANS level, including Group A , Group B QCI  testing.

I have coordinated outgassing issues on components as well as shelf life issues on expiring materials and re-certification.

New skills obtained include HFSS design and antenna simulations for patch antennas, and satellite link budget calculations.

It designs and manufactures technically differentiated electronic components, microwave, optical and radio frequency products and sub-systems that connect, protect and control critical applications. Smiths Interconnect is part of Smiths Group plc and has 21 Sales, R&D and Manufacturing locations in 12 countries, including Canada, US (Florida, Texas, Kansas, and Maryland), Mexico, Costa Rica, France, Germany, Italy, UK, Tunisia, India, China, and Singapore.

job description (3):
At CPC, I  performed many functions including inspection, inventory, test and measurement and alignment on work orders for numerous pulsed RF high frequency MRI amplifier modules for the medical industry.

I worked with network analyzers, high voltage power supplies and high power loads.  My measurements included phase and gain linearity, and standard VSWR and gain operations, which resulted in improved quality, documentation and on improved shipment times.

Additionally, I programmed and ran the HASS /HALT environmental chambers on production modules.

The modules employed regulator boards, that included bias circuits, over voltage circuits and alarms that required alignment. As part of that effort, I programmed the on board CPLD using the EPROM programming station.

*	Measurement of high power dual directional couplers, power dividers and combiners. Test and alignment of gain stability modules that adjust overall system gain over temperature variations. Structured records and procedures resulting in faster output.  
*	Programmed and ran HASS and HALT screening and life testing on production modules.
*	Test and alignment of high current regulator modules employing bias, alarm, and over-voltage circuits.
*	Analyzed and aligned temperature compensation circuits.
*	Installation of programming software for the embedded CPLD using the EPROM programmer station, on both XILINX and ALTERA integrated circuits that help improve delivery times.
linkedin description (3): Communication Power Corporation (CPC, founded in 1994) is dedicated to providing world class amplifiers. Our products are designed to provide the best performance for each customer whether the end user is OEM, clinical, a research institution or industrial. The goal of CPC is to ensure high quality, outstanding performance, reliability, flexibility with customer requirements and on-time delivery.
linkedin specialities (3): RF Amplifiers
job description (4):
I gained experience designing, tuning and testing phase locked microwave oscillator systems , L band thru Ku band, both DRO and CRO type MIC and solder assemblies for space applications resulting in increased shipments and new orders. I also  performed highly critical phase noise measurements of ultra-stable microwave sources.

Microwave measurements were necessary at alignment and final test data stages using analyzers, chart recorders and temperature chambers for Boeing Aerospace WGS and Intelsat programs. I was Responsible for end package final data presentation to the customer.

Additionally, I performed design of microwave test fixtures for production testing of hybrid MIC amplifiers, and generated mechanical drawing markups for immediate machine shop work orders.

Full alignment and tuning on a hot/cold plate of DRO and CRO circuits including frequency set, particle getter and burn in,  were part of my daily responsibilities.

I generated ATP procedures and datasheets for production use and upload into the document control system.

Lastly, I was responsible for electromagnetic simulation of stripline couplers using Ansoft Designer7 EM software so that the designs could be implemented in the microwave portion of the LO subsystem.

*	Designed, tuned and tested phase locked microwave oscillator systems, L band thru Ku band, both dielectric resonant and coaxial resonant, that included hybrid MIC and solder assemblies for space applications, resulting in increased shipments and new orders. Performed highly critical phase noise measurements of ultra - stable microwave sources.  Results stored using chart recorders.                   
*	Design of Microwave test fixtures for production testing of hybrid MIC buffer, loop and output amplifiers.
*	Generated mechanical drawing markups for immediate machine shop work orders. Full alignment and tuning on hot/cold plate configurations of dielectric resonator and coaxial resonator circuits, including frequency set..

education school linkedin description (3:
The University of Antwerp (Universiteit Antwerpen) is a young and dynamic Belgian university. It is characterised by its high standards in education, internationally competitive research and entrepreneurial approach. It was founded in 2003 after the merger of the three universities of Antwerp. The university's roots go back to 1852. 

The University of Antwerp has 9 faculties and several autonomous, faculty-like institutes. Doctoral programmes are available in all faculties, with more than 20,000 students (+1,280 PhD students) registered. In total the university has around 5.500 staff members.

The University of Antwerp hosts 5 centres of excellence: Nanostructures, Molecular Neurogenetics, Environmental Studies, Social Policy, Evaluation of Vaccination

Education is student-centred and competency-based. Students are stimulated to develop into independently minded people who are capable of thinking analytically.

The University of Antwerp has adopted the bachelor-master structure. It offers 3-year Bachelor programmes (180 ECTS credits) and 1-year or 2-year Master programmes (60 or 120 ECTS credits).

The university is part of the Antwerp University Association (AUHA), a regional association with the university and 3university colleges for professional education.

summary:
I drive double-digit brand growth and increase market penetration for global iconic brands and smaller high-growth indie beauty companies. I do this by focusing on three key areas: business and competitive market analysis (to identify growth opportunities); strategic promotional planning (to capitalize on key seasonal sales periods) and partnering with retailers to ensure mutual profitability.

My expertise lies in:
     *Building and nurturing strategic partnerships with top retailers across specialty stores, department stores and off-price retailers.
     *Driving profitability through P&L management, SKU productivity optimization, and creative problem-solving.
     *Leading product launches and retail activations that align with brand objectives and exceed sales targets.

Key accomplishments include achieving 15%-100% year over year sales growth across multiple account driving $10MM in first-year sales for a new product line at Sephora, and reducing RTV liabilities by 25% through strategic initiatives. I am well-versed in all beauty segments and committed to bringing modern beauty brands to life in-store and online.

CORE COMPETENCIES:
E-Commerce & Retailer.com Optimization: Best practices for seamless online consumer experiences.
Omnichannel Marketing: Collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver cohesive strategies across digital and brick-and-mortar channels.
Business & Marketing Strategy: Insight-driven planning for profitability and growth.
Data Analysis & Reporting: Translating complex data into actionable strategies.
Sampling & Merchandising: Innovative programs and in-store execution for brand visibility.
Forecasting & Budgeting: Precision in planning to meet and exceed sales goals.
Stakeholder Engagement: Proven expertise in cultivating relationships with clients, retailers, and vendors.

Celebrity makeup artist Jeanine Lobell founded Stila in 1994. The Company name is derived from the Italian word "stilare,"​ which means "to pen"​. Stila believes that makeup should be as individual as each woman's own signature. 

Stila creates products for the eyes, cheeks, lips and face as well as for complexion perfection and multi-use. The Company also sells brushes and accessories. Stila’s modern, uniquely illustrated and inspiring packaging is made out of recycled materials that are durable as well as distinctive. Stila has also continually sought new ways to teach makeup techniques, either over the Internet or within the product container. 

Today, Stila is known for its modern, sophisticated, non-intimidating approach to beauty. The brand's innovative, multi-tasking formulas, eco-friendly packaging, and fashion-forward colors have cemented its place on must-have lists of top beauty editors around the world. The prestige color brand regularly appears on the pages of magazines like Allure and InStyle, and is also used by top designers during New York fashion week.

linkedin description:
The L’OCCITANE Group is a leading international manufacturer and retailer of premium and sustainable beauty and wellness products. The Group operates in 90 countries worldwide and has 3,000 retail outlets, including over 1,300 of its own stores. 
Within its portfolio of premium beauty brands that champion organic and natural ingredients are: Maison L'Occitane en Provence, Melvita, Erborian, L’OCCITANE au Brésil, LimeLife by Alcone, ELEMIS, Sol de Janeiro and Dr. Vranjes Firenze. 
Innovative venture studio OBRATORI is also part of the Group. 

With its nature-positive vision and entrepreneurial ethos, L’OCCITANE Group is committed to investing in communities, biodiversity, reducing waste and to finding sustainable solutions to create a better and healthier planet.
The mission statement of the Group is: With empowerment we positively impact people and regenerate nature. 
The L'OCCITANE Group is a certified B Corporation.
linkedin specialities: Beauty, Retail, Cosmetics

linkedin description:
As the leader in humanely raised and sustainably sourced pet food, Open Farm believes that high quality nutrition, animal welfare, sustainability, and transparency go hand in hand.  

Headquartered in Toronto, Open Farm is one of the fastest growing pet food companies in North America and a certified B-Corporation. This accomplishment reflects our decade-long commitment to Doing Some Good for animals and the planet. 

We are on a mission to empower pet parents with high quality nutrition for pets, crafted from humanely raised and sustainably sourced ingredients. Open Farm offers a range of premium pet food products including dry and wet foods, bone broths, treats, freeze-dried raw, freshly crafted meals, and supplements. Formulated with a focus on environmental stewardship, animal welfare, and transparent sourcing, Open Farm gives pet parents ethical and sustainable choices for their beloved companions.  

We're also proud of our strong partnerships with leading animal welfare and sustainability certifications including Global Animal Partnership, Certified Humane, Ocean Wise, and the Marine Stewardship Council.

We Feed The Need to Move!

Since 1993, we have been a company dedicated to athleticism.  We offer fast-acting energy, hydration, and muscle-rebuilding recovery products in support of athletes and an encouraging community of people committed to pushing through limits and reaching for challenges.  We believe movement, regardless of intensity and distance, is the key to longevity and happiness.

Our Core Values are alive in everything we do at GU.  Authored by a cross functional group of employees – these values are what we see, feel, touch, and hear in our company culture:

• Love. Be passionate about GU and compassionate toward each other. Love what we do!
• Athleticism. Respect the effort and achievement of all athletes and live your best athletic life.     
• Innovation. Strive for innovation and improvement in everything you create, make, and do. Be curious. 
• Longevity. Make decisions that are sustainable over the long term for our customers, company, and planet. 
• Collaboration. Work toward team goals, recognize assists from others, and celebrate wins together.  
• Accountability. Be responsible for your actions and keep your commitments.

We provide medical, dental, vision, matched 401K, & additional benefits, industry discounts, and more. 
 
Want to join the GU Crew?  Check out our openings by visiting us at www.guenergy.com/careers

linkedin description:
The Davines Group begins its journey in Parma in 1983, with the Bollati family's idea of establishing a laboratory for the production of high end hair products.

After a decade of research and improvement the company decides to focus on its own brands by launching from scratch Davines and [comfort zone] brands, the first one dedicated to the professional hairdressing, the other one to the skin care spas and treatments market.

Today the Davines Group is present in 95 countries and employs a multicultural team spanning 34 different nationalities and in 2016 had become a member of the group of so-called B Corps, whose purpose, in addition to profit, is maximizing their positive impact by providing innovative solutions to environmental and social issues whilst respecting the highest standards of performance, transparency and accountability.

Besides the Parma headquarters, we have branches in New York, Paris, London, Mexico, Netherland, Hong Kong, Shanghai and Düsseldorf.

Davines Group is now a recognized leader in the formulation and manufacturing of high end skin and hair care products.

Davines style is a reflection of curiosity and openness to the world and of the Italian heritage of history, art, design and good taste.

Promoting and transforming an holistic, healthy and sustainable lifestyle concept into a beautiful reality is our mission. Creating beauty from the inside out is our passion.

Our purpose:
Do our best for the world, creating good life for all, through beauty, ethics and sustainability.

• Oversee and lead major construction projects, including hotels, residential, commercial spaces ranging from $5M up to $80M, including:

   -133 3rd Ave Residences - An East Village 16-story High-End Residential project, 21,524 sq.ft (pending construction)
   -Park Hotel at 158W 58st - A complete renovation of the existing 10-story building, 26,056 sq.ft (Completed 2019)
   -Newfield development -The 205,000 sq.ft. project consists of Three 4-story Residential buildings of total 144 units, 371 parking spaces, community facilities, luxury & commercial space of 9,000 sq.ft. (pending construction)

"Designed by William B. Tabler Architects( WBTA): 
The name William B. Tabler Architects (WBTA) is synonymous with hotel planning and design around the world. The firm’s historical roots date back to 1946 when William B. Tabler Sr. wrote his famous “Rules of Thumb”, an architectural guide for hotels that set the standard for design in the hospitality industry; and for the expansion of the Sheraton, Hilton, Marriott, Intercontinental and Stouffer chains, all William B. Tabler Architects clients''.

New York Institute of Technology's six schools and colleges offer undergraduate, graduate, and professional degree programs in in-demand disciplines including computer science, data science, and cybersecurity; biology, health professions, and medicine; architecture and design; engineering; IT and digital technologies; management; and energy and sustainability. A nonprofit, independent, private, and nonsectarian institute of higher education founded in 1955, it welcomes nearly 8,000 students worldwide.

The university has campuses in New York City and Long Island, New York; Jonesboro, Arkansas; and Vancouver, British Columbia, as well as programs around the world. More than 112,000 alumni are part of an engaged network of physicians, architects, scientists, engineers, business leaders, digital artists, and healthcare professionals. linkedin description:
Philpac Corporation was established in September of 1982 under the leadership of founder Bruce Phillips.
Philpac has two facilities. One located on Military Road in Buffalo, NY consisting of 92,000 square feet of manufacturing and office space, and the other facility is located in Mapleton Road in Pendleton, NY which has 75,000 square feet and houses our wood division.

Philpac quickly became a leader in providing a full line of packaging products. We are set apart by being not only a distributor, but also a manufacturer of packaging items.
"One Stop Shopping"​ affords our customers to take advantage of our in house box making, foam fabrication and lamination. Our wood department produces crates, specialty wood products for domestic and export shipments and pallets.

Philpac focuses on each customer's special requirements, using best processes to produce the best product for the best value.
linkedin specialities: Packaging, Wood Crates, Corrugated Boxes, Pallets, Foam

education school linkedin description (1:
Hunter College, located in the heart of Manhattan, is the largest college in the City University of New York (CUNY), one of the oldest public colleges in America, and a national leader in urban public education. 

More than 23,000 students currently attend Hunter, pursuing undergraduate and graduate degrees in more than 170 programs of study. Graduates of Hunter’s four nationally renowned professional schools – the School of Education, the Silberman School of Social Work, and the Hunter-Bellevue School of Nursing – become the teachers, social workers, nurses, and health care professionals who dedicate their lives to serving New York City and the nation. They are the embodiment of the Hunter College motto: Mihi Cura Futuri – the Care of the Future Is Mine. 

With the myriad opportunities found in New York City, and world-renowned faculty to guide them, Hunter’s students embark upon their bright and illustrious futures and begin to achieve their version of the American Dream!

job description:
The Barton Partnership is an award-winning executive recruitment firm providing permanent search, independent consulting, and consulting services from strategy to execution.    

Since 2007, we have partnered with FTSE-listed and Fortune 500 companies across all sectors/industries; SMEs, Strategic, Innovation & Management Consulting firms (large and boutique), Public Sector, Global Financial Services, Private Equity and Venture Capital organisations.  

We support our clients globally from offices in London, New York, Paris, Singapore, Hong Kong, and Sydney.  

Our network represents talent across all disciplines and sectors associated with Strategy & M&A, Digital, Data & Analytics, ESG & Sustainability, and Transformation & Change.  

Through a curated network of more than 8,500 independent consultants, we provide clients with individuals and teams for business-critical projects across EMEA, the US, and APAC. Our consulting network has been globally recognised in Forbes' World's Best Management Consulting Firms report in 2024 and 2023 and for three consecutive years by The Financial Times.  

As a B-Corp™ certified business, we hold ourselves accountable to a higher benchmark of sustainable business practices, committed to driving positive change for our clients, community, and the environment.

linkedin description: Haines Fire and Risk Consulting (HFRC) provides a comprehensive assortment of fire protection consulting services to help its clients better understand and control their fire risks.  HFRC specializes in facilities that manufacturer, store and handle flammable liquids, combustible liquids, flammable gases and other hazardous materials.  HFRC's clients include some of the largest oil and gas, chemical, warehousing/distribution and pharmaceutical companies in the US and world.  Some of the services provided by HFRC include:  Surveys and  inspections;   Fire pump and suppression system testing;  Water supply testing and assessments;  Code consulting and negotiation;  Facility and business risk assessment;  Fire/explosion investigation, forensic engineering and expert witness;  Water supply studies;  Emergency planning and preparedness;  Training and drills;  Construction services;  Fire brigade organization and safety.\n\nHFRC is a distributor of firefighting and fire suppression equipment including Hytrans Fire System, Task Force Tips, Akron Brass, Harrington LDH, National Foam, American AVK and Turbodarft.

Headquartered in Wilmington, Delaware, ChristianaCare is one of the country’s most dynamic health care organizations, centered on improving health outcomes, making high-quality care more accessible and lowering health care costs.

ChristianaCare includes an extensive network of primary care and outpatient services, home health care, urgent care centers, three hospitals (1,336 beds), a freestanding emergency department, a Level I trauma center and a Level III neonatal intensive care unit, a comprehensive stroke center and regional centers of excellence in heart and vascular care, cancer care and women’s health. It also includes the pioneering Gene Editing Institute.

ChristianaCare is nationally recognized as a great place to work, rated by Forbes as the 2nd best health system for diversity and inclusion, and the 29th best health system to work for in the United States, and by IDG Computerworld as one of the nation’s Best Places to Work in IT. ChristianaCare is rated by Healthgrades as one of America’s 50 Best Hospitals and continually ranked among the nation’s best by U.S. News & World Report, Newsweek and other national quality ratings. ChristianaCare is a nonprofit teaching health system with more than 260 residents and fellows. With its groundbreaking Center for Virtual Health and a focus on population health and value-based care, ChristianaCare is shaping the future of health care.

summary:
I'm passionate about making meaningful connections and driving positive change in the world.

With a background in the food and beverage industry, I thrive on challenging myself and others to make a positive impact by asking the question "How does this decision impact each other and the world around us?". Whether it's solving complex problems, fostering innovation, or building collaborative teams, I'm always eager to tackle new challenges.

Throughout my career, I've experienced working across several departments for startups and global brands working in operations, business development, brand marketing, and executive leadership. These experiences have shaped my expertise in building brands and growing companies on a global scale, equipping me with the knowledge and insights needed to deliver exceptional results.

I believe in fostering a culture of continuous learning and personal growth. I'm also a firm believer in the power of community and collaboration. Connecting with like-minded professionals, sharing insights, and engaging in thought-provoking discussions are invaluable to me. Let's connect and explore how we can support each other on our professional journeys.

If you're interested in brand strategy consultations or partnering up on a personal or professional project, feel free to reach out. I'm always excited to explore new possibilities and forge meaningful partnerships.

summary:
Everyone has a story.
 
At emc3, we bring stories to life with powerful creativity, grounded in meticulous organisation and efficiency.
 
How? By carefully curating 3 touch points: people, spaces, messaging.
 
At our core, we believe that an event is a story; live, in-person and in real time.
 
We develop events and experiences that inspire conversations; create memories; transform. We are in a unique position because we started our agency as a concierge service. So unlike activation agencies that begin with concept, then implement it from the top down, the essence of what we do is based on our knack for connecting people, bringing ideas into fruition by curating key bespoke elements like venue sourcing, strategic partnerships and supplier relationships.
 
20 + years later, we are now a full service agency.
 
We understand the potential of events to amplify digitally. We also foresee the spectrum of possibilities to explore within experiential marketing.
 
In response to that, we have developed 4 key areas of expertise: Events, Marketing, Design and Speaker Management. Together our departments create a seamless offline and online journey.
 
Almost all our events are digitally integrated, and double as immersive online experiences, creating valuable branded content across a multitude of platforms.
 
From our head office in the heart of London, we work across five continents.
 
No stranger to discerning clients, we have worked with LinkedIn, Google, Bullhorn, NYU, Drift and EA amongst others to amplify their brands through experience.
 
From developing a 2500-strong conference over several days, to planning an exclusive round table forum for executives, branding and marketing an event, the success of our projects hinge on delivering a seamless experience that delights its audience and remains true to the brand identity.
 
Our deep-rooted logistical expertise, creativity and meticulously detailed approach - enable us to create experiences where every moment counts.
linkedin description:
Epic events, positive impact: creating moments that matter.

We’re emc3 – innovators in sustainable events, ensuring every moment counts.

We’re incredibly proud to be a Certified B Corporation and a winner of the King’s Award for Enterprise in International Trade — the UK’s highest official recognition for British businesses.

We’re honoured to be recognised for:

🏆 Best Approach to Sustainability - Campaign Experience Awards 

🏆 Global Agency of the Year 2025 - Conference News - four years in a row!
🏆 Tech Event of the Year - Conference News Awards

🥇 Gold Winner – Tech Event - Eventex, the world’s #1 awards for events

🌱 Power 30 Most Sustainable Agencies - Micebook

We produce transformative in-person, virtual, and hybrid events for the world’s leading brands, including Microsoft, Google, HP, Meta, and TikTok.

Our approach blends strategy, content, and creativity to ensure your brand story resonates with impact, inspires your audience, and leaves a lasting impression. With sustainability at our core, we prioritise environmental responsibility, DEIA, and CSR to craft events that drive positive impact and build meaningful connections.

But don’t just take our word for it…

“I can highly recommend them. Loved working with them, loved the end result, and loved how reliable they were.”
— Louis Boettger, Product Marketing Manager, Google

“We’ve had Senior Executives telling us that it has been the best event ever, so you should feel extremely proud!”
— Isabella Phoenix, Global Head, HP Sustainability

“We wanted to work with the best — and that’s emc3.”
— Zach Nadler, CEO, Vayner Speakers

Let’s create something unforgettable, together.
linkedin specialities: Conference Management, Event Management, Creative Production, Conference Planning, Talent Management, Keynote Speaker Sourcing, Roadshows, Corporate Parties, Exhibitions, Awards Ceremonies, Educational Events, Team Building , Free Venue Sourcing , Design , Marketing, Social Media , Gala Dinners, VIP Events , Destination Management
job description (2):
emc3 is the world's leading events agency, utilizing the power of strategic storytelling and creativity to ensure every moment counts at your event.

We work with our clients to create events that raise the bar of the attendee experience, by inspiring conversations, creating memories, and transforming the way that businesses connect with their customers.

We start this process with our strategic alignment workshop, which dives into our client’s needs before identifying what it will take to bring their story and vision to life—whether in-person, virtual or hybrid. It’s this approach which has earned us the pleasure of working on events like Veecon and with clients such as Google, Twilio, LinkedIn, Miro and Drift and won us numerous awards along the way, including Conference News’ Global Agency of The Year, and MiaList’s Team of The Year!

Then, we get to work! Producing game-changing experiences powered by strategy, content and creativity, underpinned by our commitment to a sustainable future. Our unique approach combines innovation with logistical expertise, forming long-term partnerships with our clients to help discover what triggers their customer buy-in, align their messaging and empower their attendees to maximize success. 

Because at emc3, we know that everyone has a story—and we work with our partners to tell it in a way that makes every moment count.

education school linkedin description (1:
Full Sail University is an award-winning educational leader for those pursuing careers in entertainment, media, arts and technology. Founded in 1979, Full Sail has received accolades throughout its 40+ year history, including most recently: 
* One of the 2021 "Top Graduate & Undergraduate Schools to Study Game Design" by The Princeton Review 
* One of the 2021 "Top 50 Film Schools" by The Wrap Magazine
* 2019 "School/College of the Year" by the Florida Association of Postsecondary Schools and Colleges
 
Full Sail is a graduate and undergraduate degree-granting institution offering on-campus and online degree programs in areas related to Art & Design, Business, Film & Television, Games, Media & Communications, Music & Recording, Sports, and Technology. Full Sail alumni have worked on countless award-winning projects with individual recognition including OSCAR®, Emmy®, GRAMMY®, ADDY®, MTV Video Music Award, and Video Game Award honors.
 
 
What Makes Full Sail Different?
 
Our 210+ acre campus is located in Winter Park, FL. From game studios, to venues, to boardrooms and film sets, our classrooms are designed to look and feel like industry production environments – because they are.
 
Full Sail degrees are built around real-world experience – project-based work in professional environments and on professional software and hardware. Our education is offered at an accelerated pace, which allows students to graduate in about half the time of a traditional bachelor's program. This unique approach helps prepare our students for the entertainment media world they want to join after graduation.
 
Full Sail’s community consists of 22,000+ students, 2,200+ full-time equivalent employees, 83,565+ graduates, and 600+ educators with academic and professional credentials. Our community is united by the desire to learn through creating.
 
Connect with us: https://www.fullsail.edu/connect-with-us
 
Full Sail is accredited by the Accrediting Commission of Career Schools and Colleges.

ComForCare is New York State Licensed Home Care Services Agency and a premier provider of non-medical, private duty home care services for people of all ages.

Our caregivers can assist people with the activities of daily living in any setting they call home, whether it be a private residence, nursing facility or an independent or an assisted living community. 

We are available 24 hours a day, 365 days a year and provide a wide range of personal services including:
* Grooming & Hygeine
* Bathing & Toileting
* Meal Preparation
* Transportation/Errands
* Medication Reminders
* Safety Supervision

linkedin description:
ComForCare is a premier home care franchise made up of franchise offices that provide in-home care with locations in the U.S. and Canada. We help seniors live independently in their own home.

We serve in any setting you call home, whether it is a private home, independent or assisted living community or skilled care facility.

Our services include Alzheimer’s disease and dementia care, personal care, respite care for families, transition of care after a hospital or rehabilitation stay, chronic condition management, transportation, medication reminders, light housekeeping & laundry, shopping and errands, safety supervision, companionship and much more. Our services are available 24 hours a day, 365 days a year from compassionate caregivers who are experienced, trained, bonded and insured. 

The ComForCare mission is to improve the quality of life and level of independence for every client and family receiving our services.

ComForCare operates as At Your Side Home Care in Houston, Texas (www.atyoursidehomecare.com). 

ComForCare is a Best Life Brands, LLC company.

Each ComForCare office is independently owned and operated. ComForCare is an equal opportunity employer.

education school linkedin description (2:
Since 1847, The City College of New York has provided a high quality and affordable education to generations of New Yorkers in a wide variety of disciplines. CCNY embraces its role at the forefront of social change. It is ranked #1 by The Chronicle of Higher Education out of 369 selective public colleges in the United States on the overall mobility index. This measure reflects both access and outcomes, representing the likelihood that a student at CCNY can move up two or more income quintiles. In addition, the Center for World University Rankings places CCNY in the top 1.2% of universities worldwide in terms of academic excellence. More than 15,000 students pursue undergraduate and graduate degrees in eight professional schools and divisions, driven by significant funded research, creativity and scholarship. 

CCNY is as diverse, dynamic and visionary as New York City itself. Outstanding programs in architecture, engineering, education and the liberal arts and sciences prepare our students for the future, and produce outstanding leaders in every field. Whether they are drawn to the traditional, like philosophy or sociology, or emerging fields like sonic arts or biomedical engineering, our baccalaureate graduates go on to graduate programs at Stanford, Columbia or MIT – or they stay right here in one of our 50 master's programs or our doctoral programs in engineering, the laboratory sciences, and psychology. 

Nowhere else in the city do undergraduates have so many opportunities to conduct research with professors and publish and present their findings. In our science, engineering and social science programs, more than 300 undergrads work alongside senior researchers in funded projects. Leading CUNY in funded research, we house a number of research centers. Nearly all of our full-time faculty hold PhDs or—like our architecture faculty—maintain professional practices. Art professors exhibit their work, film professors make films, and music professors perform in venues

linkedin description:
The Davines Group begins its journey in Parma in 1983, with the Bollati family's idea of establishing a laboratory for the production of high end hair products.

After a decade of research and improvement the company decides to focus on its own brands by launching from scratch Davines and [comfort zone] brands, the first one dedicated to the professional hairdressing, the other one to the skin care spas and treatments market.

Today the Davines Group is present in 95 countries and employs a multicultural team spanning 34 different nationalities and in 2016 had become a member of the group of so-called B Corps, whose purpose, in addition to profit, is maximizing their positive impact by providing innovative solutions to environmental and social issues whilst respecting the highest standards of performance, transparency and accountability.

Besides the Parma headquarters, we have branches in New York, Paris, London, Mexico, Netherland, Hong Kong, Shanghai and Düsseldorf.

Davines Group is now a recognized leader in the formulation and manufacturing of high end skin and hair care products.

Davines style is a reflection of curiosity and openness to the world and of the Italian heritage of history, art, design and good taste.

Promoting and transforming an holistic, healthy and sustainable lifestyle concept into a beautiful reality is our mission. Creating beauty from the inside out is our passion.

Our purpose:
Do our best for the world, creating good life for all, through beauty, ethics and sustainability.

linkedin description (2):
CosmoProf, a Sally Beauty Holdings company, is proud to be a community of professionals who care about our customers. Whether you want to explore a career in one of our stores, providing in-salon sales consultations, working in our Distribution Center or in a professional role at our Corporate office, we are seeking individuals who share our passion for helping our customers succeed in beauty through education, retailing and business building activities. 

Sally Beauty Company, Inc. began as a one-store operation in New Orleans, Louisiana in 1964. The Company expanded slowly until the 1980s, when it began to grow rapidly through acquisition and new store openings. In 1982, Sally moved its corporate headquarters to Denton, Texas following the acquisition of a Denton-based chain. 

In 1985, Sally acquired a major full-service (professional only) beauty supply distributor servicing the Midwestern United States. The growth of the full-service business led to the formation of the company now known as Beauty Systems Group LLC, focusing on distribution solely to the professional trade. 

New store openings and acquisitions continue to guide Sally’s expansion. In 1987, Sally became an international company with the acquisition of an affiliate in the United Kingdom. Today, Sally and its affiliates operate over 4500 stores throughout the United States and the world. Our international operations now extend to the United Kingdom, continental Europe, Puerto Rico, Canada, Chile, Peru, Colombia, Mexico. Both Sally Beauty Supply and Beauty Systems Group have successful and growing online (e-commerce) businesses. 

Sally and its affiliates have long been industry leaders. Expertise in professional product merchandising, distribution and education provides the basis for a commanding presence in the global market. This, combined with strong domestic growth and international development, positions the companies for anticipated continuing success in future years.
linkedin description (3):
Ever since the company's founding in 1887, Kao has strived to deliver value to the life of people everywhere in the world. Today, we are a leading manufacturer in the fields of hygiene, beauty and health, while our chemical business contributes to the development of diverse industries. With more than 33,000 employees, our mission is to enrich the lives of people globally and contribute to the sustainability of the world. 

In the regions of Americas, Europe, Middle East and Africa (EMEA), we focus on our Beauty Care business with premium brands in three business sectors: Consumer Care, Salon and Cosmetics.

Our Consumer Care business represents iconic skin and hair care brands that are recognized worldwide for their innovation and quality, such as John Frieda, Guhl, Jergens, Curél, Bioré and Bondi Sands.

Our Salon Business sector is committed to unleashing the creativity of stylists around the globe. With our brands Goldwell, Kerasilk, KMS Hair, Oribe and Varis, stylists have everything in their hands to create beautiful show-stopping hair representative of the individuality of their clients.

Our London-based luxury brand Molton Brown, offers fragrance, body and bath products found only in our exclusive Molton Brown stores, high-end department stores and travel retail, as well as five-star hotels around the world.  Our luxury skincare and make-up brand SENSAI combines advanced science with the unique spirituality of Japanese beauty embraced by their signature ingredient Koishimaru Silk.

All three business sectors are driven by the same values and beliefs: Creating high-quality products and constantly striving for the best is what is at the heart of everything we do. 

This is why we understand that our people are one of our core assets, and we strive for a working environment that allows team members to flourish and grow. Join us, and you will have opportunity to help us make life beautiful.

linkedin description:
The L’OCCITANE Group is a leading international manufacturer and retailer of premium and sustainable beauty and wellness products. The Group operates in 90 countries worldwide and has 3,000 retail outlets, including over 1,300 of its own stores. 
Within its portfolio of premium beauty brands that champion organic and natural ingredients are: Maison L'Occitane en Provence, Melvita, Erborian, L’OCCITANE au Brésil, LimeLife by Alcone, ELEMIS, Sol de Janeiro and Dr. Vranjes Firenze. 
Innovative venture studio OBRATORI is also part of the Group. 

With its nature-positive vision and entrepreneurial ethos, L’OCCITANE Group is committed to investing in communities, biodiversity, reducing waste and to finding sustainable solutions to create a better and healthier planet.
The mission statement of the Group is: With empowerment we positively impact people and regenerate nature. 
The L'OCCITANE Group is a certified B Corporation.
linkedin specialities: Beauty, Retail, Cosmetics
job description (2):
• Established and led the Regulatory Affairs function for the North America region, driving strategic direction and ensuring compliance across all product categories.
• Interpreted, summarized, and communicated complex regulatory information, providing cross-functional guidance to Regional and Global teams (R&D, Marketing, Supply Chain, etc.) within a multi-brand, multi-channel organization.
• Led product registration activities, coordinating with relevant authorities (FDA, Health Canada) to ensure regulatory approval and compliance.
• Oversaw the review and approval process for local packaging artworks and consumer-facing communications, ensuring scientific accuracy and regulatory compliance.
• Provided early-stage regulatory guidance on ingredients and formulations to ensure compliance of imported products, as well as on scientific data, clinical and consumer testing.
• Conducted monthly regulatory monitoring and reporting, initiating risk management meetings with the Regional Managing Director to address potential compliance risks.
• Partnered with Legal Counsel to proactively address and mitigate product-related legal risks.
• Served as the primary regulatory contact for external stakeholders, including Food and Drug, Prop 65, Advertising Law Attorneys, and represented North America in L'Occitane Group regulatory working groups with counterparts across Europe, Brazil, China, Japan, and South Korea.
• Designed, implemented, and maintained regulatory affairs procedures, aligning with the global strategy of the parent company and ensuring seamless regulatory processes.

linkedin description:
The Davines Group begins its journey in Parma in 1983, with the Bollati family's idea of establishing a laboratory for the production of high end hair products.

After a decade of research and improvement the company decides to focus on its own brands by launching from scratch Davines and [comfort zone] brands, the first one dedicated to the professional hairdressing, the other one to the skin care spas and treatments market.

Today the Davines Group is present in 95 countries and employs a multicultural team spanning 34 different nationalities and in 2016 had become a member of the group of so-called B Corps, whose purpose, in addition to profit, is maximizing their positive impact by providing innovative solutions to environmental and social issues whilst respecting the highest standards of performance, transparency and accountability.

Besides the Parma headquarters, we have branches in New York, Paris, London, Mexico, Netherland, Hong Kong, Shanghai and Düsseldorf.

Davines Group is now a recognized leader in the formulation and manufacturing of high end skin and hair care products.

Davines style is a reflection of curiosity and openness to the world and of the Italian heritage of history, art, design and good taste.

Promoting and transforming an holistic, healthy and sustainable lifestyle concept into a beautiful reality is our mission. Creating beauty from the inside out is our passion.

Our purpose:
Do our best for the world, creating good life for all, through beauty, ethics and sustainability.

company (3): Papa's Pilar Rum, Hemingway Rum Co.
linkedin description (3):
Inspired by Ernest Hemingway's spirit of adventure, Papa's Pilar™ is an artisan-crafted spirit sourced from hand-selected rums spanning the Caribbean, Central America and the U.S. then solera blended to perfection on American soil.

Rum was once a noble spirit. It was served aboard warships, rationed to visionary explorers, and used to sustain the Founding Fathers as they plotted revolution. It was a drink consumed by men who understood that you only get one shot at life.

Ernest Hemingway, or "Papa"​ as he was known, was this type of man – an adventurer who lived life to the fullest. He was an author, a free thinker, a sportsman, and a bon vivant. But he was never a spectator. Pilar was the boat that allowed this American literary giant to reach beyond the shoreline and feast on life.

Inspired by his appetite for adventure, we've proudly created a super-premium rum — Papa’s Pilar. Papa's Pilar Dark and Blonde rums have been crafted to reflect Hemingway's passions on land and at sea.

Bold, well-traveled, and uniquely American, Papa's Pilar is hell-bent on returning rum to its gutsy roots.

Live Courageously. Drink Responsibly.

linkedin description (4):
NSM provides 360-degree Complete Mobility Solutions, from customizing wheelchairs to installing chair lifts or repairing your equipment. No matter what you need, we have innovative products and a reliable team of experts to keep you moving so you can enjoy life to the fullest - wherever it takes you.

We build the right chairs for people with severe physical challenges. Many are children with birth defects, such as Cerebral Palsy, Muscular Dystrophy and Spina Bifida. We also serve teens, adults and seniors challenged with severe trauma, disease and skeletal disorders.

To get it right, we must continually adhere to a spider web of ever-changing state and federal laws, as well as insurance regulations. This requires a dedicated team of master ATPs, expert compliance /funding specialists and a national management team dedicated to what’s best for our clients. Thanks to our talented hardworking team of people, we’re able to accomplish our mission—one wheelchair at a time.

linkedin description (4):
The Body Shop International Limited is the original natural and ethical beauty brand. 

Our heritage is an amazing story of firsts. 

The first to create Body Butter, the first to use manmade musk in fragrance rather than cruelly-extracted deer musk, the first to transform the beauty industry with fair trade ingredients.

For 40 years The Body Shop showed the world that business could be a force for good, anchored in Anita Roddick’s pioneering approach to doing business. 

We exist to make a positive difference to people’s lives. We create superior quality products using the world’s finest natural ingredients to make your skin feel so good.

We have over 3000 stores in 68 countries, and reach out to customers around the world through launching e-commerce sites, opening sub-franchise businesses and identifying selective wholesale in new markets plus adding new Global Travel Retail locations around the world. 

Our people are passionate, independent, diverse individuals. 
Sounds like you? Join us!
